likely to be announced this month. Back in January, Steve Ballmer announced that Bob Muglia, the founder of Microsoft's server division, was stepping down. In an email to employees, Steve Ballmer wrote: Bob Muglia and I have been talking about the overall business and what is needed to accelerate our growth. In this context, I have decided that now is the time to put new leadership in place for STB. This is simply recognition that all businesses go through cycles and need new and different talent to manage through those cycles. Bob has been a phenomenal partner throughout this process, and he and his leadership team have the right strategy in place.
